name: Candidate Clicker
description:
---------------INFO----------------

Candidate Clicker is a game made for MiniJam 74: Chaos, in which the limitation was to only use a few keys in the game: X, A, Space, P, 8, B

It fits the theme because politics is chaotic

In this game you are a politician running for president . Press Space to gain votes and money, buy upgrades with X and A.

Try to finish with the most amount of money.
